title: London calling
author: VD
content_html:
If you’re in London and might be interested in attending a Vox-related event in the relatively near future, please shoot me an email. I don’t know if I’ll be making an announcement here or not, but I do intend to invite any regular UK readers to a small public happening at which I intend to appear.

Not being intentionally mysterious here, I’m just not permitted to talk about it.
